target.name: Sect2
target.text: Set up Your Buddy List

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click Add buddies.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Add buddies.

target.name: Step
target.text: Start typing a name in either the Users or the Groups box. A drop-down list displays matching names. Select a name, and click Apply to add the name to your list.

target.name: Step
target.text: Add as many names as you want, clicking Apply after each one.

target.name: Step
target.text: To remove a name, click the X icon after the name; then click Apply.

target.name: Step
target.text: When you finish, click Close. The new names are displayed in the buddy list.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Tips for Using Your Buddy List:

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Add Info and a Photo to Your Personal Workspace

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the Navigator, click My workspace to go to your personal workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Navigator, click My workspace to go to your personal workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: On the menu bar for your workspace, click Modify Profile.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Modify Profile window, fill in any missing information. This information is visible to others and is also used by Novell Teaming and Conferencing to contact you by phone, e-mail, or IM.

target.name: Step
target.text: Add a picture. Click BrowseÉ to look for a graphics file on your computer; then click OK. The picture is displayed in the Photo box of your profile.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Tips for Adding Photos to Your Profile:

target.name: Sect2
target.text: To Add Your First Blog Entry:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click My workspace to display your personal workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click My workspace to display your personal workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Expand you personal workspace tree at the top of your workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click on Blog.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the New > Blog Entry menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Blog Entry form that appears, type in the title of your blog entry in the Title box.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Description box, type in the content of your blog entry (use the formatting tools in the editor to format your entry).

target.name: Step
target.text: Under Attachments, you can select a file on your computer to attach to this blog entry.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK to add the entry to your blog.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: To Comment on Someone Else's Blog Entry:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Navigate to the Blog in which you want to comment.

target.name: Step
target.text: Navigate to the Blog in which you want to comment.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Add Comment beneath the blog entry on which you want to comment.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the form that appears, type in the title of your blog comment in the Title box.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type in your comment in the Description box.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK. Your comment appears below the blog entry.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Work with Teams

target.name: Sect3
target.text: To Create a Team Workspace:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the Navigator, click on the Team Workspaces link of the workspace tree.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Navigator, click on the Team Workspaces link of the workspace tree.

target.name: Step
target.text: Under the Team Workspaces tab, click Add a Team Workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Workspace Title field, type in the name for the new workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Under Team Members, select any Users and Groups you want to add as team members to this workspace. Type a character or two into either field and select the user or group you are want to add from the drop-down list that appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: Under Workspace Folders, select the types of folders you want to include in this workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: To e-mail your teammates, select the Announce the Creation of this Workspace to the Team option and type in the message you want to send.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK. The new workspace is added as a sub-workspace.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: To Add Members to a Team Workspace:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Navigate to the team workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Navigate to the team workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Add or Delete Team Members.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Add or Delete Team Members window, click in the Users or Groups fields, begin typing the user or group name and select the name from the drop-down list that appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: Repeat for each user or group you want to add.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: To View Team Members:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the workspace or folder with which the team is associated.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the workspace or folder with which the team is associated.

target.name: Step
target.text: On the menu bar, click Team.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select Show Team Membership.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Working with Favorites

target.name: Sect3
target.text: To Add a Place to Favorites:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Navigate to the workspace or folder that you want to add.

target.name: Step
target.text: Navigate to the workspace or folder that you want to add.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click to open the Favorites panel.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select Add This Place. The workspace or folder is added at the end of the Favorites list.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Take Advantage of Tagging

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Advanced Search

target.name: Sect3
target.text: To Perform an Advanced Search:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the Search section, click Advanced. The Advanced Search window appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Search section, click Advanced. The Advanced Search window appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Text field, type text related to the item for which you are searching.

target.name: Step
target.text: If you know who created (added) the item in Novell Teaming, type the name into the Authors field.

target.name: Step
target.text: If you know that the information is tagged, type the relevant tag into the Tags field.

target.name: Step
target.text: Under Places, select the option you want to use:

target.name: Step
target.text: Next to List Results, use the drop-down lists to select the number of items and the number or words (per item) that you want to retrieve for your search.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Search.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: To Use Additional Advanced Search Options:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the Search section, click Advanced. The Advanced Search tab appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Search section, click Advanced. The Advanced Search tab appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the top-right corner of the Advanced Search area, click More Options.

target.name: Step
target.text: The following options are available:
